scripts.auth-shell-angular:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/auth/shell/angular && nx run auth-shell-angular:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/auth/shell/angular --access public
scripts.auth-shell-app-services:publish: npm run auth-shell-app-services:build && npm publish libs/auth/shell/app-services/dist --access public
scripts.auth-shell-dtos:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/auth/shell/dtos && nx run auth-shell-dtos:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/auth/shell/dtos --access public
scripts.auth-shell-nestjs:publish: npm run auth-shell-nestjs:build && npm publish libs/auth/shell/nestjs/dist --access public
scripts.crud-domain:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/crud/domain && nx run crud-domain:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/crud/domain --access public
scripts.crud-shell-angular:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/crud/shell/angular && nx run crud-shell-angular:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/crud/shell/angular --access public
scripts.crud-shell-app-services:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/crud/shell/app-services && nx run crud-shell-app-services:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/crud/shell/app-services --access public
scripts.crud-shell-dtos:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/crud/shell/dtos && nx run crud-shell-dtos:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/crud/shell/dtos --access public
scripts.crud-shell-nestjs:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/crud/shell/nestjs && nx run crud-shell-nestjs:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/crud/shell/nestjs --access public
scripts.shared-angular:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/shared/angular && nx run shared-angular:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/shared/angular --access public
scripts.shared-domain-core:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/shared/domain-core && nx run shared-domain-core:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/shared/domain-core --access public
scripts.shared-models:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/shared/models && nx run shared-models:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/shared/models --access public
scripts.shared-mongo:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/shared/mongo && nx run shared-mongo:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/shared/mongo --access public
scripts.shared-nestjs:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/shared/nestjs && nx run shared-nestjs:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/shared/nestjs --access public
scripts.shared-users:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/shared/users && nx run shared-users:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/shared/users --access public
scripts.shared-utils:publish: npm version patch --prefix libs/shared/utils && nx run shared-utils:build --with-deps && npm publish dist/libs/shared/utils --access public
scripts.stream-domain:publish: npm run stream-domain:build && npm publish libs/stream/domain/dist --access public
scripts.stream-shell-angular:publish: npm run stream-shell-angular:build && npm publish libs/stream/shell/angular/dist --access public
scripts.stream-shell-dtos:publish: npm run stream-shell-dtos:build && npm publish libs/stream/shell/dtos/dist --access public
scripts.nestjs:publish: npm run nestjs:build && npm publish libs/shared/nestjs/dist --access public
scripts.build-storybook: build-storybook -c lisbs/shared/angular/.storybook -o dist/libs/shared/storybook && build-storybook -c lisbs/stream/shell/angular/.storybook -o dist/libs/stream/storybook
scripts.postinstall: ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main --first-only --create-ivy-entry-points && node ./decorate-angular-cli.js
